Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class OperatorAlternative.Alternative

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.OperatorAlternative.Alternative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OperatorContainer
    Enclosing class:
    OperatorAlternative
    public class OperatorAlternative.Alternative
extends java.lang.Object
implements OperatorContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Represents an alternative subplan for the enclosing OperatorAlternative.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • traceInput

        public <T> InputSlot<T> traceInput​(InputSlot<T> inputSlot)
        Description copied from interface: OperatorContainer
        Return the InputSlot that represents the given inputSlot. NB: This method assumes the given inputSlot has no occupant (see InputSlot.getOccupant()).
        Specified by:
        traceInput in interface OperatorContainer
        Parameters:
        inputSlot - the InputSlot of a contained Operator that is to be resolved
        Returns:
        the InputSlot that represents the given inputSlot or null if there is none

      • followOutput

        Description copied from interface: OperatorContainer
        Exit the encased plan by following an outputSlot of an encased, terminal Operator.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        outputSlot - the OutputSlot to follow
        Returns:
